name: Save The Canary
description:
Save The CanaryClimb the tower to rescue the birds

A wizard has put a spell on you and the only way to get rid of it is to rescue his birds. The spell makes you keep moving and keep doing stunts.

Controls:
  • Space or Mouse click: Jump
  • ESC or P: Pause
Credits:

Programming and art done by me (rthurmed)

Sound effects: 95 SFX Pack - Beats Warrior Nian (by liujiajun)

This project uses "mousetrap" font. Made by jeti. Licensed under CC BY 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ . More info: https://fontenddev.com/fonts/mousetrap .
